artist: Potter: Gertrud Amon Natzler; Decorator: Otto Natzler
life_date: Gertrud Amon Natzler, Potter, Austrian (active United States), 1908–1971; Otto Natzler, Decorator, Austrian (active United States), 1908–2007
text: This thin-walled, colorfully-glazed pot by the Natzlers was slightly pinched for an effect that renders it non-functional.
title: Bowl
